title: Smart Data models - WaterDistributionNetwork schema
description: A data model for water distribution network in a city.

waterPressure.description: Property. Model='https://schema.org/Number'. Pressure of water flowing from the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

tankCapacity.description: Property. Model='https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum amount of water the water storage tank corresponding to this observation can hold.

tankName.description: Property. Model='https://schema.org/Text'. Name of the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

turbidity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Measurement of the amount of light that is scattered by material in the water when a light is shined through the water.

instValue.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text.Describes the instantaneous value (associated with the current timestamp) of a time varying quantity.

avgOverTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Describes the average value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

maxOverTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text.Describes the maximum value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

minOverTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Describes the minimum value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

tankDiameter.description: Property. Model='https://schema.org/Number'. Diameter of Cylindrical or Spherical water storage tanks.

tankShape.description: Property. Model='https://schema.org/Text'. Physical shape of the water storage tank corresponding to this observation. ENUM= [Cylindrical Conical Cuboid Spherical].

waterFlow.description: Property. Model='https://schema.org/Number'. Flow or current of water flowing from the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

waterLevel.description: Property. Model='https://schema.org/Number'. Current water level in the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

tankBreadth.description: Property. Model='https://schema.org/Number'. Breadth of the Cuboid shaped water storage tank.

totalML.description: Property. Model='https://schema.org/Number'. Total MLDs of water discharged from the water storage tank corresponding to this observation.

tankLength.description: Property. Model='https://schema.org/Number'. Length of the Cuboid shaped water storage tank.
